casebody.data:
No. —, Original.

Arkansas v. Texas et al. Tom Gentry, Attorney General of Arkansas, for complainant. John Ben Shepperd, Attorney General of Texas, and William H. Holloway and Marietta McGregor Creel, Assistant Attorneys General, for defendants.

This case is set for hearing on the motion for leave to file the complaint and return to rule to show cause, 345 U. S. 954, each side to be allowed thirty minutes for oral argument.
